item.description:
Dear Innovators,

We wanted to give you advance notice of a special speaker for the December Meeting - Warren Tuttle, President of the United Inventors Association, will be speaking at our December 5th, 2012 meeting!

Warren has worked behind the scenes on some very successful kitchenware products, such as the Smart Spin (8 million units sold) and the MISTO gourmet olive-oil sprayer (4 million units sold). As a marketing expert, he consults for large corporations, helping them become more innovative. He also speaks at national events, such as the International Home & Housewares Show - we are truly lucky to snag him for our meeting......please get the word out to your friends and associates! Remember, the public is now invited FREE to these open meetings.


This is a repeat -- the last time Warren was presenting, the wind-ripped-out trees all over the roads prevented most people from attending.

We record audio from our open meetings - and have a Podcast series, which you can find on itunes at the following link:
http://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/innovation-invention-speakers/id433329307
or, on the web at:
http://hearth.com/podcast/irn/podcast.xml

In order to keep our members up to date with links, announcements and other such news - we have a facebook page at:

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Innovators-Resource-Network/210705578957971

Â 

Please "like" us on facebook - we need to get a certain amount of people who check in to reap the benefits. You can also add your own comments and links, so we can have a continual exchange of links and upcoming events.
item.name: December Public Meeting with a special presentation from Warren Tuttle, UIA
